bio.short: Building cutting-edge AI systems and full-stack applications with a focus on performance, security, and scalability.
bio.long: At Orca AI, my team and I have crafted a cutting-edge RAG system, harnessing the power of OpenAI and Anthropic LLMs, which we've meticulously optimized for peak performance. My journey spans from founding team AI engineer to full-stack development across multiple domains, with expertise in AWS, TypeScript, Python, and building scalable multi-agent systems.

timeline.title: Founding Engineer
timeline.description: Building cutting-edge RAG systems using OpenAI and Anthropic LLMs. Leading development of multi-agent architectures and scalable AI infrastructure.

timeline.title: Full-Stack Engineer
timeline.description: Developed cross-platform mobile applications with React Native. Implemented real-time database solutions and authentication systems using Firebase.

timeline.title: Full-Stack Engineer Intern
timeline.description: Designed and implemented microservices architecture. Built authentication systems using OIDC protocols. Contributed to backend services and API development.

timeline.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
timeline.description: Created interactive 3D visualizations using ThreeJS. Developed responsive React components and user interfaces. Optimized web performance and animations.

contact.message: Looking for expertise in AI engineering or full-stack development? Let's connect and discuss how we can create innovative solutions for your challenges.

branding.footer: Software engineer specialized in AI systems and full-stack development, building innovative digital solutions.
